name: Taxi Driver Simulator
description:
This is your task to make a taxi driver in our game, if you want to live a crazy taxi experience, different characters from each passenger is waiting for you.

In the bustle of the city and find your purpose in the game waiting passengers during heavy traffic and take them where they want to go, of course, within the specified time. If what you meter for each passenger summer move you earn gold.

We designed a very realistic simulator cab for you, do not need to hunt impatient passengers, they shout when they see you and they expect you to get you to stop them.

This game's tempo never fell, passengers need to transport the specified time destination, you take all the passengers gas station car music to give you motivation, sometimes you need to use a shortcut, and even sidewalks to cultivate the time. Are you ready to subvert the traffic?

3 you can experience the taxi driving experience as you wish by selecting the different time modes.
Fun animations and sounds of passengers
Realistic animations taxi driver
Colorful graphics and realistic sounds
Fun tasks
publishers: BROBABIL IC VE DIS TICARET LTD STI
